thread.title: South Korea "surprised" by Trump's "readiness" to talk

title: South Korea "surprised" by Trump's "readiness" to talk
text:
South Korea "surprised" by Trump's "readiness" to talk 5:21pm EDT - 01:10 
South Korean Foreign Affairs Minister Kang Kyung-wha told a U.S. news program Seoul was ''surprised'' by how quickly U.S. President Donald Trump agreed to a summit meeting with the leader of North Korea. Rough Cut (no reporter narration.) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
South Korean Foreign Affairs Minister Kang Kyung-wha told a U.S. news program Seoul was "surprised" by how quickly U.S. President Donald Trump agreed to a summit meeting with the leader of North Korea.
